I'm a proud cosponsor of bipartisan legislation to address the WTCHP's impending budget shortfall that's being caused by the rapid rise in overall medical costs and cancer rates. I encourage my colleagues to pass this bill as quickly as possible to keep Mount Sinai's clinic and other Clinical Centers open and support the brave men and women who put their lives on the line and survived the worst terror attack in our nation's history.
